Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Vase
Description: Miniature vase with a flat circular bottom, a foot, a globular body and a short and straight neck ending with a very wide inverted lip. This vessel was crudely manufactured. The bottom is irregular. There are horizontal lines on the lower section of the body.
